answer: The study of gas-phase abundances in the Magellanic Bridge is motivated by its comparison to Galactic halo clouds, with similar relative gas-phase abundances found despite a lower metallicity (astro-ph/0101548).
explanation: This paper presents observations of the interstellar medium in the Magellanic Bridge, including the relative gas-phase abundances of various elements, which are similar to those found in Galactic halo clouds.
evidence_quote: similar to those found in Galactic halo clouds
